t: Ben's Original - Wikipedia
s: April 24, 2025 - Ben's Original, formerly called Uncle Ben's, is an American brand of parboiled rice and other related food products that were introduced by Converted Rice Inc., which is now owned by Mars, Inc. Uncle Ben's rice was first marketed in 1943 and was the top-selling rice in the United States until ...

t: Uncle Ben's becomes Ben's Original in 'brand evolution' | Food Dive
s: September 23, 2020 - The face that appeared on Uncle Ben's rice products — which belonged to Black Chicago waiter and chef Frank Brown and not the Texas rice farmer for whom the brand was named — will not appear on the new packaging.
